column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#T_SP=custom.Span|label
#T_RL=custom.Relation|label|BT_custom.Span
#Text=P E R F U M E S
#Text=
#Text=164.
#Text=Scented Tables or Pastils.
#Text=Beat into a fine powder, and sift through a hair sieve,
#Text=a pound of the Marc or Residuum left in the still after
#Text=making Angelic Water then put it into a mortar, with a  handful of fresh-gathered Rose Leaves, and a small porringer full of Gum Tragacanth softened with Rose Water,
#Text=Beat the whole into a Paste; roll it out on a dresser, with a
#Text=rolling pin, and cut it into Lozenges with a knife.
#Text=To form scented Pastils, roll up bits of this Paste in the
#Text=shape of a cone, that they may stand upright, and set them
#Text=by to dry.
#Text=This kind of Pastils are lighted in the same
#Text=manner as a candle.
#Text=They consume entirely away; and,
#Text=while burning, exhale a fragrant smoke.
#Text=
#Text=165.
#Text=A pleasant Perfume,
#Text=
#Text=Take a drachm of Musk, four Cloves, four ounces of
#Text=Lavender-seed, a drachm and a half of Civet, and half a
#Text=drachm of Ambergris ; heat your pestle and mortar, and
#Text=rub the Musk, Cloves, and Lavender-seeds, together, with
#Text=a lump of Loaf Sugar and a wine-glass full of Angelic or Rose-water.
#Text=Take a handful of powder, and incorporate
#Text=it well with this mixture, then sift it through a sieve ; add
#Text=two or three pounds more powder, or even a larger quantity,
#Text=till the perfume is brought to a proper degree of strength.
#Text=As to the Civet, put it on the end of a hot pestle, and rub
#Text=it well with a handful of powder ; after which add, by little
#Text=and little, fix pounds of powder; then sift the whole through
#Text=a hair sieve to incorporate it with the other perfumed powder.
#Text=The Ambergris must be well rubbed in the mortar;
#Text=and by degrees two pounds of powder, either white or grey,
#Text=must: be added to it, till the Ambergris is thoroughly incorporated with the powder; then sift through a hair sieve, and
#Text=mix all the three powders together.
#Text=This perfume is to be kept in a Leather Bag, the learns of which are well sewed
#Text=with waxed thread.
